name: OrderApi_GetList
description: Get a list of all orders optionally filtered by date

minOrderDate.description: Specifies the oldest order date to include in the response

maxOrderDate.description: Specifies the newest order date to include in the response

pageSize.description: Specifies the pagesize. Defaults to 50, max value is 250

shopId.description: Specifies a list of shop ids for which invoices should be included

orderStateId.description: Specifies a list of state ids to include in the response

tag.description: Specifies a list of tags the order must have attached to be included in the response

minimumBillBeeOrderId.description: If given, all delivered orders have an Id greater than or equal to the given minimumOrderId

modifiedAtMin.description: If given, the last modification has to be newer than the given date

modifiedAtMax.description: If given, the last modification has to be older or equal than the given date.

articleTitleSource.description: The source field for the article title. 0 = Order Position (default), 1 = Article Title, 2 = Article Invoice Text

excludeTags.description: If true the list of tags passed to the call are used to filter orders to not include these tags
